1385.verse: وَإِذَآ|And when|85|108|96$أَذَقْنَا ٱلنَّاسَ|We let [the] mankind taste|200|247|8066$رَحْمَةً|mercy|78|125|2636$مِّنۢ بَعْدِ|after|91|138|280$ضَرَّآءَ|adversity|83|106|8067$مَسَّتْهُمْ|has touched them,|145|151|8068$إِذَا|behold!|68|81|1370$لَهُم|They have|90|103|98$مَّكْرٌ|a plot|62|75|8069$فِىٓ|against|68|81|89$ءَايَاتِنَا‌ۚ|Our Verses.|97|110|1344$قُلِ|Say,|50|63|1922$ٱللَّهُ|"Allah|56|62|2323$أَسْرَعُ|(is) more swift|116|132|5675$مَكْرًا‌ۚ|(in) planning."|112|143|8070$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|101|58$رُسُلَنَا|Our Messengers|125|156|8071$يَكْتُبُونَ|write down|93|124|751$مَا|what|53|69|262$تَمْكُرُونَ|you plot.|101|101|8072$

1386.verse: هُوَ|He|48|56|298$ٱلَّذِى|(is) the One Who|134|149|138$يُسَيِّرُكُمْ|enables you to travel|161|176|8073$فِى|in|48|63|89$ٱلْبَرِّ|the land|74|89|5263$وَٱلْبَحْرِ‌ۖ|and the sea,|104|119|5657$حَتَّىٰٓ|until,|64|72|526$إِذَا|when|55|63|1370$كُنتُمْ|you are|70|87|214$فِى|in|48|65|89$ٱلْفُلْكِ|the ships|80|97|6502$وَجَرَيْنَ|and they sail|105|122|8074$بِهِم|with them|86|103|125$بِرِيحٍ|with a wind|96|113|8075$طَيِّبَةٍ|good,|67|75|8076$وَفَرِحُواْ|and they rejoice|128|141|8077$بِهَا|therein|66|92|1203$جَآءَتْهَا|comes to it|95|121|8078$رِيحٌ|a wind|63|89|8079$عَاصِفٌ|stormy,|96|122|8080$وَجَآءَهُمُ|and comes to them|148|161|3077$ٱلْمَوْجُ|the waves|89|99|8081$مِن|from|50|71|53$كُلِّ|every|57|78|185$مَكَانٍ|place,|70|91|8082$وَظَنُّوٓاْ|and they assume|133|154|6985$أَنَّهُمْ|that they|83|104|461$أُحِيطَ|are surrounded|119|129|8083$بِهِمْ‌ۙ|with them.|91|100|125$دَعَوُاْ|They call|80|98|8084$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|70|184$مُخْلِصِينَ|sincerely|109|126|6352$لَهُ|to Him|62|80|1807$ٱلدِّينَ|(in) the religion,|126|144|1208$لَئِنْ|(saying), "If|99|108|4795$أَنجَيْتَنَا|You save us|101|116|8085$مِنْ|from|50|79|53$هَـٰذِهِۦ|this,|73|102|374$لَنَكُونَنَّ|surely we will be|129|158|5682$مِنَ|among|63|92|156$ٱلشَّـٰكِرِينَ|the thankful."|112|127|3334$

1387.verse: فَلَمَّآ|But when|82|90|141$أَنجَـٰهُمْ|He saved them,|124|139|8086$إِذَا|behold!|68|83|1370$هُمْ|They|53|68|49$يَبْغُونَ|rebel|80|95|3063$فِى|in|48|63|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the earth|92|107|100$بِغَيْرِ|without|70|78|612$ٱلْحَقِّ‌ۗ|[the] right.|94|109|613$يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ|O mankind!|131|160|188$إِنَّمَا|Only|55|84|102$بَغْيُكُمْ|your rebellion|108|137|8087$عَلَىٰٓ|(is) against|95|124|52$أَنفُسِكُم‌ۖ|yourselves,|95|110|2097$مَّتَـٰعَ|(the) enjoyment|128|143|8088$ٱلْحَيَوٲةِ|(of) the life|96|127|817$ٱلدُّنْيَا‌ۖ|(of) the world.|117|148|818$ثُمَّ|Then|53|84|293$إِلَيْنَا|to Us|57|88|1234$مَرْجِعُكُمْ|(is) your return|121|136|2929$فَنُنَبِّئُكُم|and We will inform you|169|208|8089$بِمَا|of what|71|148|43$كُنتُمْ|you used (to)|111|188|214$تَعْمَلُونَ|do.|92|131|725$

1388.verse: إِنَّمَا|Only|55|80|102$مَثَلُ|(the) example|112|162|1869$ٱلْحَيَوٲةِ|(of) the life|96|146|817$ٱلدُّنْيَا|(of) the world|112|162|818$كَمَآءٍ|(is) like (the) water|150|175|8090$أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ|which We sent down|158|174|5824$مِنَ|from|50|83|156$ٱلسَّمَآءِ|the sky,|84|117|157$فَٱخْتَلَطَ|so absorbs|91|124|8091$بِهِۦ|[with] it,|79|112|204$نَبَاتُ|(the) plants|99|115|8092$ٱلْأَرْضِ|(of) the earth|112|124|100$مِمَّا|from which|92|116|216$يَأْكُلُ|eat|64|88|8093$ٱلنَّاسُ|the men|75|99|112$وَٱلْأَنْعَـٰمُ|and the cattle,|120|144|8094$حَتَّىٰٓ|until|64|88|526$إِذَآ|when|55|67|1370$أَخَذَتِ|takes|78|93|8095$ٱلْأَرْضُ|the earth|92|122|589$زُخْرُفَهَا|its adornment|111|141|8096$وَٱزَّيَّنَتْ|and is beautified|129|159|8097$وَظَنَّ|and think|81|111|8098$أَهْلُهَآ|its people|84|99|4199$أَنَّهُمْ|that they|83|92|461$قَـٰدِرُونَ|have the power|124|142|8099$عَلَيْهَآ|over it,|69|86|1269$أَتَـٰهَآ|comes (to) it|107|124|8100$أَمْرُنَا|Our command|110|128|8101$لَيْلاً|(by) night|86|104|8102$أَوْ|or|41|50|154$نَهَارًا|(by) day,|82|94|8103$فَجَعَلْنَـٰهَا|and We make it|123|147|648$حَصِيدًا|a harvest clean-mown,|173|197|8104$كَأَن|as if|57|81|4179$لَّمْ|not|42|66|63$تَغْنَ|it had flourished|126|138|8105$بِٱلْأَمْسِ‌ۚ|yesterday.|91|104|8106$كَذَٲلِكَ|Thus|77|103|702$نُفَصِّلُ|We explain|91|117|5638$ٱلْأَيَـٰتِ|the Signs|82|108|1099$لِقَوْمٍ|for a people|99|125|1100$يَتَفَكَّرُونَ|who reflect.|107|120|7010$

1385.verse: And when We give the people a taste of mercy after adversity has touched them, at once they conspire against Our verses. Say, "Allah is swifter in strategy." Indeed, Our messengers record that which you conspire

1386.verse: It is He who enables you to travel on land and sea until, when you are in ships and they sail with them by a good wind and they rejoice therein, there comes a storm wind and the waves come upon them from everywhere and they assume that they are surrounded, supplicating Allah, sincere to Him in religion, "If You should save us from this, we will surely be among the thankful."

1387.verse: But when He saves them, at once they commit injustice upon the earth without right. O mankind, your injustice is only against yourselves, [being merely] the enjoyment of worldly life. Then to Us is your return, and We will inform you of what you used to do.

1388.verse: The example of [this] worldly life is but like rain which We have sent down from the sky that the plants of the earth absorb - [those] from which men and livestock eat - until, when the earth has taken on its adornment and is beautified and its people suppose that they have capability over it, there comes to it Our command by night or by day, and We make it as a harvest, as if it had not flourished yesterday. Thus do We explain in detail the signs for a people who give thought.

1389.verse: And Allah invites to the Home of Peace and guides whom He wills to a straight path
